TopicTitle: Suggestion: [VAB] delete parts from parts manager

Articles.Content:
so you can delete all those struts and fuel lines that got snipped from buggy symmetry
and so you don't need to try and navigate the VAB to find all the ends
I think a hide option would be a handy addition. Maybe even a "hide parts without options/toggles" tickbox at the top of the window. Would certainly make navigating that menu much easier.
